title: Visual Processing Explanation
text: Preattentive processing allows the audience to focus on elements that immediately stand out.

title: Visual Emphasis
text: To avoid overwhelming your audience, you need to use minimal element(s) such as color.

title: Scale on Charts
text: The scale on the chart is related to what kind of data is used, and how best to display it aesthetically, not to make one element stand out.

title: Amount of Data Included
text: It may not be enough information to only display a single data point. The preattentive processing is capable of handling more than one piece of information at a time to process later.
